Hotel Portfolio

A collection of images I've taken from my adventures around the world.

No. 7

Casa XVII Villa

My sister Matia & I spent a week in Spain wandering around this gorgeous old little town and it was incredible to be able to call Casa XVII our home base.

No. 13

Berawa Luxe

hotel lifestyle

No. 11

Astor & Tyne

The client wanted to showcase their amazing formal workwear in typical environments outside of work, such as a cafe or bar. Shooting in Bali was a challenge, however we scouted a number of amazing venues that helped bring the campaign the client envisioned to life.

 hotel lifestyle

No. 10

Amita Villa

It was an absolute pleasure working with the team at Amita Villa, the goal was to capture the light airy bedrooms & beautifully designed bathrooms, along with the minimal yet beautifully landscaped gardens. A true retreat venue nestled in the heart of Canggu.

 hotel

No. 9

Alternative Beach Opening Night

Alternative Beach is the newest & arguably the most epic pool bar to open in Canggu! Not only is it a pool bar, but it offers boutique hotel rooms, dorm accommodation & a restaurant! The owner is an absolute champion & I was more than happy to help shoot their opening night.

 hotel lifestyle

No. 6

Shiraz Riad, Morocco

I had an opportunity to stay & shoot this recently renovated Riad (villa) in the heart of the old medina in Marrakech, Morocco. Similar to the villa I stayed & shot in Seville, the attention to detail here made it so photogenic. The light in Morocco is famous in the photography world & the way the architect has bought light into the building made shooting it a real pleasure.

 hotel lifestyle

No. 5

Joshua District

The folks at Joshua District invited me to stay at two of their epic shipping container villas on the coast west of Canggu to capture some lifestyle photography for them. I've always loved the concept of reusing old shipping containers as homes & I did not expect to find them almost unrecognisable - a true reflection of how good the guys at Joshua District are at design!

 hotel lifestyle
